languages.text: Вольный Торговец нанял{mf||а} моторных вандалов для охраны периметров городов-ульев. Несмотря на сделку, порой происходят грабежи и нарушения порядка.
The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец нанял{mf||а} моторных вандалов для охраны периметров городов-ульев. Несмотря на сделку, порой происходят грабежи и нарушения порядка.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a engagé les Vandales mécaniques pour garder le périmètre des cités-ruches de la planète. Malgré cette mesure, vols et autres infractions continuent de se produire occasionnellement.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a engagé les Vandales mécaniques pour garder le périmètre des cités-ruches de la planète. Malgré cette mesure, vols et autres infractions continuent de se produire occasionnellement.

languages.text: 自由開拓者はエンジン破壊者を雇い、この惑星の多層都市周辺を警備させている。にもかかわらず、強盗やその他の秩序違反が時折発生する。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はエンジン破壊者を雇い、この惑星の多層都市周辺を警備させている。にもかかわらず、強盗やその他の秩序違反が時折発生する。

languages.text: 行商浪人雇佣了引擎破坏者来守卫行星巢都周边区域，但即便如此，抢劫与其他违法行为仍时有发生。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人雇佣了引擎破坏者来守卫行星巢都周边区域，但即便如此，抢劫与其他违法行为仍时有发生。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente contrató a los Vándalos del Motor para vigilar los perímetros de las ciudades colmena del planeta. A pesar de ello, de vez en cuando siguen produciéndose robos y otras transgresiones.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente contrató a los Vándalos del Motor para vigilar los perímetros de las ciudades colmena del planeta. A pesar de ello, de vez en cuando siguen produciéndose robos y otras transgresiones.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Maschinenvandalen angeheuert, die Stadtgrenzen der Makropolen des Planeten zu bewachen. Dennoch kommt es gelegentlich noch zu Raubüberfällen und anderen Verstößen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Maschinenvandalen angeheuert, die Stadtgrenzen der Makropolen des Planeten zu bewachen. Dennoch kommt es gelegentlich noch zu Raubüberfällen und anderen Verstößen.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, gezegenin kovan kentlerinin çevresini korumaları için Makine Vandallarını kiraladı. Buna rağmen ara sıra hâlâ soygunlar ve benzeri asayiş ihlalleri meydana geliyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader hired the Engine Vandals to guard the perimeters of the planet's hive cities. In spite of this, robberies and other violations of order still occur from time to time.
